main{span: span{from: P1, to: P4}} :- 
  source{char: "f", id: P1} &
  source{char: "o", id: P2} &
  source{char: "o", id: P3} &
  next{left: P1, right: P2} &
  next{left: P2, right: P3} &
  next{left: P3, right: P4}.

main :- repSep([a-z], <succeed>).
----
application/datalog
main{span: span{from: P1, to: PN}} :- 
  main_item{span: span{from: P1, to: PN}} |
  main_item{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}} &
  main{span: span{from: P2, to: PN}}.
main_item{span: span{from: P1, to: P1}} :- 
  source{char: C, id: P1} &
  "a" <= C &
  C <= "z".

main :- expr.
expr :- (intLit | funcCall).
intLit :- [0-9].
funcCall :- [ident, "(", expr, ")"].
ident :- repSep(([a-z] | [A-Z]), <succeed>).
----
application/datalog
expr{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}} :- 
  expr_choice_0{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}} |
  expr_choice_1{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}}.
expr_choice_0{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}} :- 
  intLit{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}}.
expr_choice_1{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}} :- 
  funcCall{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}}.
funcCall{seq_0: span{from: P0, to: P1}, seq_1: span{from: P1, to: P2}, seq_2: span{from: P2, to: P3}, seq_3: span{from: P3, to: P4}, span: span{from: P1, to: P4}} :- 
  funcCall_seq_0{span: span{from: P0, to: P1}} &
  funcCall_seq_1{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}} &
  funcCall_seq_2{span: span{from: P2, to: P3}} &
  funcCall_seq_3{span: span{from: P3, to: P4}}.
funcCall_seq_0{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}} :- 
  ident{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}}.
funcCall_seq_1{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}} :- 
  source{char: "(", id: P1} &
  next{left: P1, right: P2}.
funcCall_seq_2{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}} :- 
  expr{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}}.
funcCall_seq_3{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}} :- 
  source{char: ")", id: P1} &
  next{left: P1, right: P2}.
ident{span: span{from: P1, to: PN}} :- 
  ident_item{span: span{from: P1, to: PN}} |
  ident_item{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}} &
  ident{span: span{from: P2, to: PN}}.
ident_item{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}} :- 
  ident_item_choice_0{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}} |
  ident_item_choice_1{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}}.
ident_item_choice_0{span: span{from: P1, to: P1}} :- 
  source{char: C, id: P1} &
  "a" <= C &
  C <= "z".
ident_item_choice_1{span: span{from: P1, to: P1}} :- 
  source{char: C, id: P1} &
  "A" <= C &
  C <= "Z".
intLit{span: span{from: P1, to: P1}} :- 
  source{char: C, id: P1} &
  "0" <= C &
  C <= "9".
main{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}} :- 
  expr{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}}.
